item.description: We always enjoy our visits here - it’ll be a fun night!  Come join us after work for great conversation, delicious Chinese hors d’oeuvres and mingle with old and new friends!  There is no charge.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 831 Farmington Avenue:  I‑84, Exit 42 (Park Road), turn right then left onto Trout Brook Drive, right onto Farmington Avenue.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
